amendatorysection.catchline: Sales without permit; penalty; limitation on claim.
amendatorysection.para: Any person selling a current tractor model of one hundred or more horsepower for use in the State of Nebraska without a permit issued by the department for such tractor model shall be required to repurchase any such tractor model sold in Nebraska for which a permit has not been issued. A claim by a purchaser under this section shall be brought within two years from the date of purchase.
